script.title: Segmentology DV360
script.description: DV360 funnel analysis using Census data.
instructions: Join the StarThinker Assets Group to access the following assets
Copy DV360 Segmentology. Leave the Data Source as is, you will change it in the next step.
Click Edit Connection, and change to BigQuery->{field:recipe_project}->(field:recipe_slug}->Census_Pivot.
Or give these intructions to the client.

dataset.description: Create a dataset for bigquery tables.

field.name: auth_write
field.description: Credentials used for writing data.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Place where tables will be created in BigQuery.

field.name: auth_write
field.description: Credentials used for writing function.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.

field.name: auth_read
field.description: Credentials used for reading data.

field.name: partners
field.description: DV360 partner id.

field.name: advertisers
field.description: Comma delimited list of DV360 advertiser ids.

field.name: recipe_timezone
field.description: Timezone for report dates.

field.name: recipe_name
field.description: Name of report, not needed if ID used.

field.name: auth_read
field.description: Credentials used for reading data.

field.name: recipe_name
field.description: Name of report, not needed if ID used.

field.name: auth_write
field.description: Authorization used for writing data.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.

field.name: auth_write
field.description: Authorization used for writing data.

from.query:
SELECT
           Partner_Id,
           Partner,
           Advertiser_Id,
           Advertiser,
           Campaign_Id,
           Campaign,
           Zip,
           SAFE_DIVIDE(Impressions, SUM(Impressions) OVER(PARTITION BY Advertiser_Id)) AS Impression_Percent,
           SAFE_DIVIDE(Clicks, Impressions) AS Click_Percent,
           SAFE_DIVIDE(Conversions, Impressions) AS Conversion_Percent,
           Impressions AS Impressions
         FROM
           `{project}.{dataset}.DV360_KPI`;

field.name: recipe_project
field.description: Project ID hosting dataset.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Place where tables will be created in BigQuery.

field.description: Place where tables will be written in BigQuery.

field.description: Authorization used for writing data.

field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.
